howToPlay.title: How to Play Bau Cua Tom Ca
howToPlay.description: Bau Cua Tom Ca is a fun and simple Vietnamese dice game. Bet on symbols, roll the dice, and win based on the results!
howToPlay.step1: Choose one or more symbols (Gourd, Crab, Shrimp, Fish, Rooster, Deer) to place your bets on.
howToPlay.step2: Place your wager on the selected symbols. You can bet on multiple symbols in one round.
howToPlay.step3: Three dice, each with the six symbols, are rolled.
howToPlay.step4: If a symbol you bet on appears on one or more dice, you win! Payouts are based on how many dice show your symbol (e.g., 1:1 for one die, 2:1 for two dice, 3:1 for three dice).
howToPlay.note: Note: Unmatched bets are lost, and the game is fast-paced, so get ready for quick rounds!
